_comment: you need to make one location for each node and only add one node for each location
_comment2: btw, you can use the eggs from dashactyl v0.4 here too.

eggs.name: Eggactyl
eggs._comment: change this egg id to the egg id from pterodactyl

prices._comment: price per 100 for cpu, memory, disk and price per 1 server

j4r._comment: coins will NOT be removed if the user leaves the guild after getting rewards.

mining._comment: Create an account on nicehash.com, go to https://www.nicehash.com/my/mining/rigs, then click on mining address, and paste that address here.
mining._comment2: The amount of coins below will be given to the user for every 5 minutes they mine.

renewal._comment: after how many days to cut the coins for the server renewal, if the user does not have enough coins, suspend the server.
renewal._comment2: if true, the suspended servers will be deleted after the days you mentioned below if the user still doesn not have enough coins
